about_the_game:
NPUnrealSample - 2023 Season Pass

Contains consumable items.
1. Promotion GameMoney Gift Card 500
- It is a virtual currency that can be used within the application.
You can use the virtual currency to unlock features in the application, and purchase UI skins and UI sounds.
You can purchase one item per 100 GameMoney.

Promotion GameMoney Gift Card 500 is equivalent to 500 GameMoney Gift Card.

name: NPUnrealSample - 2023 Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
